title: Restoring from backup from one Pixel 3 to another Pixel is not restoring the Home Screen layout. I h
content: Restoring from backup from one Pixel 3 to another Pixel is not restoring the Home Screen layout. I have confirmed that the Pixel Launcher settings are backed up to drive from the old device. The layout does not restore via wireless restore on the new device or a restore using the cable. Both devices are using the same default launcher and same Android versions.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
